Canonical correlation analysis

Developed by Gabriel Hoffman

Run on 2021-09-14 10:07:53

Source: vignettes/cca.Rmd
cca.Rmd
library(decorrelate)
library(Rfast)
library(ggplot2)
library(CCA)
library(RCCA)
n = 200

p.array = seq(10, 400, by=100)

df = lapply(p.array, function(p){

  X = matrnorm(n,p)
  Y = matrnorm(n,p)

  res1 = system.time(decorrelate::cca(X,Y, .1, .1))
  res2 = system.time(rcc(X,Y, .1, .1))
  res3 = system.time(whitening::scca(X,Y))
  res4 = system.time(decorrelate::fastcca(X,Y))

  rbind(data.frame(Method = "My cca", p = p, t(c(res1))),
    data.frame(Method = "rcc", p = p, t(c(res2))),
    data.frame(Method = "scca", p = p, t(c(res3))),
    data.frame(Method = "fastcca", p = p, t(c(res4)))   )
  })
df = do.call(rbind, df)

ggplot(df, aes(p, elapsed, color=Method)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_classic()
p.array = seq(10, 4000, by=1000)

df = lapply(p.array, function(p){
  message("\r", p, '   ', appendLF=FALSE)

  X = matrnorm(n,p)
  Y = matrnorm(n,p)

  res1 = system.time(decorrelate::cca(X,Y))
  res2 = system.time(whitening::scca(X,Y))
  res4 = system.time(decorrelate::fastcca(X,Y))

  rbind(data.frame(Method = "My cca", p = p, t(c(res1))),
    data.frame(Method = "scca", p = p, t(c(res2))),
    data.frame(Method = "fastcca", p = p, t(c(res4))))
  })
df = do.call(rbind, df)

ggplot(df, aes(p, elapsed, color=Method)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_classic()
p.array = seq(10, 10000, by=1000)

df = lapply(p.array, function(p){
  message("\r", p, '   ', appendLF=FALSE)

  X = matrnorm(n,p)
  Y = matrnorm(n,p)

  res1 = system.time(decorrelate::cca(X,Y))
  res4 = system.time(decorrelate::fastcca(X,Y))

  rbind(data.frame(Method = "My cca", p = p, t(c(res1))),
    data.frame(Method = "fastcca", p = p, t(c(res4))))
  })
df = do.call(rbind, df)

ggplot(df, aes(p, elapsed, color=Method)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_classic()
n = 1000

p.array = c(seq(10, 1000, by=75), seq(1000, 20000, by=400))

df = lapply(p.array, function(p){

  message("\r", p, "   ", appendLF=FALSE)

  X = matrnorm(n,p)
  Y = matrnorm(n,p)

  res = c()

  if( p < 9000){
    tm = system.time(decorrelate::cca(X,Y))
    res = rbind(res, data.frame(Method = "decorrelate::cca", p = p, t(c(tm))))
  }

  if( p < Inf){
    tm = system.time(RCCA(X,Y, 0.1, 0.1))
    res = rbind(res, data.frame(Method = "RCCA::RCCA", p = p, t(c(tm))))
  }

  if( p < 1000){
    tm = system.time(rcc(X,Y, 0.1, 0.1))
    res = rbind(res, data.frame(Method = "CCA::rcc", p = p, t(c(tm))))
  }

  if( p < 3000){
    tm = system.time(whitening::scca(X,Y, verbose=FALSE))
    res = rbind(res, data.frame(Method = "whitening::scca", p = p, t(c(tm))))
  }

  if( p < Inf){
    tm = system.time(decorrelate::fastcca(X,Y))
    res = rbind(res, data.frame(Method = "decorrelate::fastcca", p = p, t(c(tm))))
  }

  res
  })
df = do.call(rbind, df)

ggplot(df, aes(p, elapsed, color=Method)) + geom_line() + geom_point() + theme_classic() + ylab("Wall time (seconds)") + scale_color_brewer(palette="Set1") + theme(aspect.ratio=1)
n = 50000
p = 100
X = matrnorm(n,p)
rownames(X) = paste0("sample_", 1:n)
colnames(X) = paste0("feature_", 1:p)

Y = matrnorm(n,p)
rownames(Y) = paste0("sample_", 1:n)
colnames(Y) = paste0("feature_", 1:p)

system.time(res <- decorrelate::fastcca( X,Y, k=4))
dim(res$x.vars)


X = matrnorm(n,p)
Y = matrnorm(n,p)

system.time(res <- decorrelate::cca( X,Y, k=200))
dim(res$xcoef)
